import { Component, OnInit, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-button', templateUrl: './button.component.html', styleUrls: ['./button.component.scss'] }) export class ButtonComponent implements OnInit { @Input() text?: String; @Input() type = "default"; @Input() link? : String; @Input() img? : String; @Input() color? : String; @Input() move = false; // @Input() id? : String; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
